recordingpixels: Large: Approx. 17.90 megapixels (5184 x 3456) Medium: Approx. 8.00 megapixels (3456 x 2304) S1 (Small 1): Approx. 4.50 megapixels (2592 x 1728) S2 (Small 2): Approx. 2.50 megapixels (1920 x 1280) S3 (Small 3): Approx. 350,000 pixels (720 x 480) RAW: Approx. 17.90 megapixels (5184 x 3456) M-RAW: Approx. 10.10 megapixels (3888 x 2592) S-RAW: Approx. 4.50 megapixels (2592 x 1728)
battery: Battery Pack LP-E6 (Quantity 1) * AC power can be supplied via AC Adapter Kit ACK-E6 * With Battery Grip BG-E9 attached, size-AA / LR6 batteries can be used
noisereduction: Applicable to long exposures and high ISO speed shots
shutterspeeds: 1/8000sec. to 1/60sec. (Full Auto mode), Flash X-sync at maximum 1/250sec. 1/8000sec. to 30secs., bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode.)
recordingmedia: SD memory card, SDHC memory card, SDXC memory card
imagetype: JPEG, RAW (14-bit Canon original) RAW + JPEG simultaneous recording possible
exposurecontrol: Program AE (Full Auto, Flash Off, Creative Auto, Portrait, Landscape, Close-up, Sports, Night Portrait, Program), shutter-priority AE, aperture-priority AE, manual exposure, bulb exposure
afassistbeam: Small series of flashes fired by built-in flash
recordingformat: Design rule for Camera File System 2.0
basic: Shoot by ambience selection, Shoot by lighting or scene type
type: Digital, single-lens reflex, AF / AE camera with built-in flash
flashexposurecompensation: ±3 stops in 1/3- or 1/2-stop increments FE lock Provided
externalflash: EX-series Speedlite (Flash functions settable with the camera)
focusmodes: One-Shot AF, AI Servo AF, AI Focus AF, Manual focusing (MF)
coverage: Vertical / Horizontal approx. 96% (with Eye point approx. 22mm)
picturestyle: Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Neutral, Faithful, Monochrome, User Def. 1 - 3
compatiblelenses: Canon EF lenses (including EF-S lenses) (35mm-equivalent focal length is approx. 1.6 times the lens focal length)

audiovideooutdigitalterminal: Analog video (Compatible with NTSC / PAL) / stereo audio output for personal computer communication and direct printing (Hi-Speed USB equivalent)
